>
[Crafter's Eyepiece](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3072)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=637" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 288 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn eyepiece

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This rugged metal eyepiece etched with square patterns is designed to be worn over a single eye. Twisting the lens reveals a faint three-dimensional outline of an item you plan to build or repair, with helpful labels on the component parts. You gain a +1 item bonus to Crafting checks. When you Repair an item, increase the Hit Points restored to 10 + 10 per proficiency rank on a success or 15 + 15 per proficiency rank on a critical success.

The eyepiece grants a +2 item bonus and can be activated. 

**Activate—Prototype** <actions string="" /> 1 minute ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You calibrate the eyepiece to have it cast a 5th-rank [_creation_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1477) spell over the course of 1 minute to construct a temporary item.
